parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Team Switch

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a unit into the list of units available for [[Team_Switch|Team Switch]]. Units marked as [[playableUnits|playable]] in editor are automatically switchable.
This command allows to add non-playable unit into array of [[switchableUnits]] and make them available for [[teamSwitch]]. SP only.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[addSwitchableUnit]] unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addSwitchableUnit]] bob</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[teamSwitch]], [[removeSwitchableUnit]], [[switchableUnits]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
